__e: Mind you, I modify nothing concerning the various corruptions in the Church.
The world's corruption runs deeper than even you know.
"I'm a cop and you're going to get parking tickets for the rest of your life?"
I know that God loved you more than all other living creatures... and you repaid his divine love with sin... with hate, corruption, evil.
But there's so much corruption out there, I was wondering, I mean, the thing would be if...
You talked a good game about corruption and dirty cops, but you failed to mention that you're wanted for murder.
